About

A little background about me.

  • 2012

    University of Colorado at Boulder

    Starting attending university working towards my BS in Computer Science in CU's College of Engineering and Applied Sciences. Expected to graduate May of 2016!

  • March 2013 - February 2014

    PetroDE

    Start-up based in Boulder, Colorado. Need to add more informatio here

  • May 2014

    Hewlett Packard: Enterprise Group

    Started my intership with HP. Focused mainly on Firmware Integrity testing on HP's Superdome 2 Enterprise Servers, current and future iterations. Primarily used Perl and Bash Shell Scripting for testing.
